long_description: A guidebook to 4-season cragging and world-class bouldering in the Bishop, California area. Authors: Peter Croft and Marty Lewis. Softcover; 335 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Maximus Press; copyright 2008. Updated edition includes Alabama Hills, Cardinal Pinnacle, Whitney Portal, Buttermilk Country, Happy Boulders and Pine Creek. Each area features an overview topo map; each climb features a photograph, illustrated routes, and written descriptions and ratings of each route. The third edition of.
short_description: A guidebook to 4-season cragging and world-class bouldering in the Bishop, California area.
